pageProduct.name: U by Kotex Maternity Pads 10 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Specifically designed to provide added protection for heavy post-natal flow. U by Kotex® Maternity Pads for maximum protection are looking after you at a time when you most need some TLC. Cotton-like, soft, flexible, longer and a fraction wider means they also provide added protection when you're lying down. Goodness knows you need the rest.

  • Specifically designed to provide added protection and greater absorption for heavy post-natal flow.
  • With channel embossing to help keep pad in shape and prevent bunching
  • Just that little bit longer and wider for extra protection when you're lying down
  • Soft cotton-like cover for a dry, comfortable feeling


 

Maximum Protection Pads

Boxed Contents: 10 Pads

Size: 10 Pack

Directions

Remove wrapper and peel strip in one quick move

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Do not flush
